description: Description of Development: Request for scoping opinion for redevelopment of land in the northern part of the Kensal Canalside Opportunity Area, as a mixed-use development comprising: Creation of approximately 2,600 homes, re-provision of the existing supermarket, provision of additional commercial uses (retail, cafes/restaurants, workspace), community uses and the creation of public realm, open space amenities and the re-opening of a canal basin. Provision of a new access strategy into the site, in combination with new pedestrian and vehicular access and associated new open space, landscaping, car and cycle parking and infrastructure works.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: Sainsbury's And Surrounding Former Utilities Land, Canal Way,LONDON, W10
